output:
Map {
User Stories {
Display Unsupported Orders: As a user, I want to be able to view orders that are not supported by the Roleplaying Games application.
Select Travel Time: As a user, I want to be able to select a travel time for my character in the game.
Create Character: As a user, I want to be able to create a character with a unique name, race, and class.
Customize Character: As a user, I want to be able to customize my character's appearance, stats, and abilities.
Save Character: As a user, I want to be able to save my character so I can continue playing with them later.
Choose Adventure: As a user, I want to be able to choose an adventure to embark on with my character.
View Map: As a user, I want to be able to view a map of the game world.
Interact with NPCs: As a user, I want to be able to interact with non-player characters in the game.
Combat System: As a user, I want to be able to engage in combat with enemies in the game.
Inventory System: As a user, I want to be able to manage my character's inventory.
}
}
